body: Should we copy `dilations` as well? (And if we should, we should do that in `CopyAttrsPadWithConv2D` as well.)
body_html: Should we copy dilations as well? (And if we should, we should do that in CopyAttrsPadWithConv2D as well.)
body_text: Should we copy dilations as well? (And if we should, we should do that in CopyAttrsPadWithConv2D as well.)
